content: **drops crochet poncho and knitted skirt in 2 threads alpaca size s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the burgundy bride skirt pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** s m/l xl/xxl xxxl **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio poncho 400-450-500-600 g color no 3770 dark pink drops circular needle size 4 mm us 6 40 and 80 cm 16 and 32 or size needed to get 19 sts x 23 row in stockinette st with 2 threads alpaca = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 drops crochet hook size 5 mm h/8 or size needed to get 20 double_crochet with 2 threads alpaca = width 10 cm 4 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/109-46-b---burgundy-bride-skirt
